name: Evo
description:
Genetic Algorithms for Dynamo.

Evo is a custom open-source package designed to be used in Dynamo environment. So far includes C#-coded nodes responsible for solving single-objective optimization problems using Genetic Algorithms (GA). The package is suitable for optimizing multi-variable number-based problems as well as combinatorial ones.

For more info see the specification and sample files in the extra folder. See also: github.com/majasinski/Evo
contents: AckleyFunction - A non-convex Ackley function., DistanceBetweenPoints - Calculates distance between points cooridnates., Evo.ContinueWhile - Termines evaluation of genetic algorithm if termination conditions are met., Evo.Init - Creates init input for evaluation of genetic algorithms using LoopWhile node and Evo package., Evo.LoopBody - Definition of evaluation body for a genetic algorithm instance, iterated by LoopWhile and Evo package., TravellingSalesmanProblem - Evaluates distance between points (cities) in a classing Travelling Salesman Problem.
